author: joeyaiello
body:
Begins to address #3439 

This first pass just deleted or changed language that is not accurate.
It still needs another pass where new known issues are added.

Also, I corrected the style of the document to use pure semantic line feeds. If that's no longer the right thing to do, I can go back and correct it, but I think it's what we agreed on. 

<!--

If you are a PowerShell Team member, please make sure you choose the Reviewer(s) and Assignee for your PR.
If you are not from the PowerShell Team, you can leave the fields blank and the Maintainers will choose them for you. If you are familiar with the team, feel free to mention some Reviewers yourself.

For more information about the roles of Reviewer and Assignee, refer to CONTRIBUTING.md.

-->
title: First pass of known issues doc
